categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The siege of Nulan VI was a battle that took place some time after the introduction of TIE bombers to the Imperial Navy and the formation of Scimitar assault wing. The planet Nulan VI rebelled against the Galactic Empire and came under siege. The Scimitar assault wing was instrumental in ending the siege, when they utilized a tactic of deep-atmospheric precision bombing to force Nulan VI's capital to surrender.
